website_summaries.verdict: Butter warmer set perfect for enjoying a seasonal seafood meal.
pros: Includes 2 generously sized ramekins with handles and wire stands along with all the tools you need to enjoy a shellfish feast
There’s also a handy odor remover to rid yourself of the lingering scent or fish and garlic
cons: Stands are a bit low, necessary to keep an eye on butter to prevent burning

customer_reviews.title: BUTTER WARMING CROCKS WERE NICE, HOLDERS COULD HAVE BEEN HIGHER
customer_reviews.text: BUTTER WARMING CROCKS WERE NICE, HOLDERS COULD HAVE BEEN HIGHER , TOO LOW TO THE FLAME (BOIL OVER) THE CLAW CRACKERS WERE ON THE FLIMSY SIDE AND NOT VERY GOOD QUALITY. KIND OF PRICEY FOR WHAT I ENDED UP GETTING.
customer_reviews.author: R. Edward Dysonjr

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous, butter heats too hot!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set as far as the utensils go. The butter warmers get way too hot and are dangerous. I used the candles that came with the set and they heated the butter so hot it actually was popping up in the air. We had to blow out the candles. One warmer cracked at the spout it was so hot! Not a safe set. People at the crab feed commented they had never seen a warmer do that. One couple had a set that was also purchased on Amazon that sat higher from flame and worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Martita

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: We eat a lot of shellfish, such as crab legs and this set worked out nicely. We also purchased the seafood scissors, which is a world changer if you like crab legs.
customer_reviews.author: Helene B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Crab
customer_reviews.text: This set was super cute and great for our King crab Christmas dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Korey

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: ====Pros: (++++++) +quality build +small enough to econome butter +heats fast +cup holder stay cold +base stay cold +instruments work fine ====Cons: (-) -cup slides a little bit on base ====Verdict: Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your Crab Feed events
customer_reviews.text: great little set up. At first I thought the fork things were flimsy but they worked perfect and they didn't bend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my brother and sister-in-law as an anniversary present. They love it! And it wasn't very expensive! Separately, I bought myself one of the steel "soap" bars. It really does get garlic and onion smell off my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These work great. They crushers haven't broke yet as some cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They crushers haven't broke yet as some cheap one do. The butter warmers really work well and butter stays hot.
customer_reviews.author: n7

customer_reviews.title: The butter warmers are amazing and add to the experience
customer_reviews.text: what a treat it is to use this set. The butter warmers are amazing and add to the experience. The hand tools for crab and lobster are sturdy and angle for ease of use. Get crackin!
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little butter bowls! They work perfectly and also love the forks never realized how useful they were until I got them! So much easier to pull the meat right out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: ... more fragile and cheap feeling than I would have liked. No problems
customer_reviews.text: The product is decent but a little more fragile and cheap feeling than I would have liked. No problems, I just wish the crackers were heavier and the butter holders didn't feel like they were so thin.
customer_reviews.author: stufff

customer_reviews.title: This set is perfect for a seafood dinner
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for a seafood dinner ... the butter crockpots are a good size and the butter heats quickly. Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: M Cody

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good set to have. Looks nice, but not super fancy. Forks are sturdy. Crackers could be a little better, but definitely get the job done. Wish there was a little more space between flame and butter dish. I had to temporarily blow the flame out since the butter started boiling and splattering.
customer_reviews.author: jamlovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We eat a lot of dungenous crab. This set is perfect! The butter holders are adorable & actually hold a lot more better than one would think. The claw crackers work great & are of strong qualify. The forks get meat out of the tiniest claws. Not sold on the stone that takes the crab odor off of hands, but we didn't purchase this product for the stone. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LisaPosta

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for friends who love seafood. They were delighted to get it.
customer_reviews.author: A Tailor Sews

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these, they heat the butter quickly and the the tools work great not cheap like some sets. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Complete set of lobster eating utensils
customer_reviews.text: With this set of utensils it's easy to make quick work of lobster dinner
customer_reviews.author: A Furry Bear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Meets the needs of four. Well worth the buy. Delivery was timely as well.
customer_reviews.author: MsHart2u

customer_reviews.title: everyone should have a set
customer_reviews.text: love this, have wanted one for a while and it is great! keep the butter nice and melty and the utinsels are great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times and really enjoy how easy it makes eating crab.
customer_reviews.author: Robin K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and my friend loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think the little candles would keep the butter very warm, but it actually made it a little too hot. I ended up blowing them out and I'll let the flame work down a bit. This really adds a nice touch to a dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Chambless

customer_reviews.title: Norpro Seafood Serving Set
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great. Compliments any table setting, great for intimate dinners. Buy it, you'll like it, at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: shister

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Find!
customer_reviews.text: I was invited to my friend's house for some crabs. We get a small group together every year. This year I brought this set with me and everyone loved it. It made eating the crabs much more enjoyable. I'm thinking about ordering another set!
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: The best of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift to my son, who cooks crab and lobster frequently so I don't know how it's working for him but the product looked good to me. I'll have to ask him how it held up over time. I read all the reviews from the other sets and one of them even rusted. This set got good reviews and that's why I bought this one. Only time will tell how it holds up and he hasn't had it long enough to write an appropriate review.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Matches the set I bought last year perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: estof

customer_reviews.title: More than bargained for
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with quality and numerous uses. This was a good buy. The odor control bar really works well!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we love is set. we use it at least once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. Use them all the time. Not much more to say than they look nice on the table and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ruebensaal

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift, my friend loved it. Can't wait for the next lobster dinner. Thinking of getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Miss G

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great Intimate Set To Enjoy Crab IN A Sophisticated Way The Only Complaint Is Storage Of The Set! No box
customer_reviews.author: E.Rod

customer_reviews.title: Best Set Ever
customer_reviews.text: When you walk into a crab fest prepared, people notice! I love everything about this serving set and everyone was jealous at the party! The cups were perfect for heating up clarified butter and the tools for cracking shells were perfect. I recommend this set to anyone who wants to make a statement and is serious when it comes to cracking shellfish!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Crab was more delicious. 🦀
customer_reviews.text: Going to a crab feed? Your gonna need this! And some butter... Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: SubeChivas

customer_reviews.title: Good set except......
customer_reviews.text: The set works fine. The crackers and pic's are good quality. The jury is still out on the warmers. They seem like they would tip over and spill contents fairly easy? I've used them a half dozen times and havn't had a problem,but I'm EXTRA caefull. (Maybe I should try drinking wine,when I do lobster?) Anyway, I recommend the set for quality,just be carefull! Oh, and be sure to get it from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: All parts were there
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it out yet but all the parts were there. I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 because the forks look and feel a little flimsy or that they'd bend if too much pressure is applied. Other than that it looks like a good set, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Lover

customer_reviews.title: Serve like a pro
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy eating and serving lobster once in a while. This set makes it more fun. It is well made and so far, I have no problems. I felt ir was worth the extra money to get the butter warmers... there is nothing more gross than dipping lobster into cold butter,,,,, and this is a cool way to keep it warm at the table.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These worked great!! Each cup holds 1/2 cube of butter and it took very little time for it to melt. Butter was kept just the right temp for the duration of it's use. Very good purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: lynda hickman

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is a lot of fun at our seafood night. They are so hot the butter stays very warm without the flame after the cup gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have not tried it yet but I love it, its looks sturdy, perfect for a crab dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Brown

customer_reviews.title: love the butter lanterns
customer_reviews.text: we love to do crab boils when we have guests. The lanterns keep the butter hot and the crackers work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pappa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of crabbing when the season is on and using the forks was driving my wife crazy. I love the butter pots and the pickers are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice to have your own little warm butter container when your indulging in crabs and lobster! The little tea light candles last a long time and can be replaced easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Cape Cod summer essential tools
customer_reviews.text: Rented a beach house on Cape Cod Bay, MA and the house did not have any lobster tools. We bought these using our PRIME 2 day shipping and had it delivered right to our vacation house. Perfect for 2-4 people but you have to share the crackers. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia R. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This set is so complete and " proper". I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kattai Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on Christmas eve and it was just what I was looking for. Everyone complimented me regarding them.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: very happy with these, they do the job
customer_reviews.text: these are great, keeps butter from getting cold, great price, come quickly, I am very pleased with them.this was my second set
customer_reviews.author: bobjoyce1970

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for when we had lobster one night
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for when we had lobster one night! Not so sure about the metal stone, but the rest is great.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great item for Crab and Lobster night!
customer_reviews.text: I use this set when my family does a crab or lobster night at home. The butter warmers are very charming. The handle and spout comes in handy for pouring butter over food or into small containers. But beware of splattering butter if they get too hot! The scoopers and crackers work great. Also, my family members were impressed with the odor remover - it gets rid of the fishy smell on your hands quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: It's even better than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this seafood serving set is very good quality from the crackers to the meat picks. The butter warmers melt the butter quickly and easily. If you like seafood, this set is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Jasperbob

customer_reviews.title: GReat gift idea
customer_reviews.text: If you or someone you know eats a lot of seafood, this is the perfect gift. Great price and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: JES-C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the utensils are very handy. I wish that the bowls were larger, they don't handle much liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bass

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: The set is very nice. The warmers kept our butter warm the whole time. Did have a problem keeping the flames lit outside though. Forks were a good size for getting the meat out of the lobsters.
customer_reviews.author: T. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: EASY EATING SEAFOOD SET
customer_reviews.text: HOW CAN YOU EAT CRAB AND LOBSTER WITHOUT SHELL CRACKERS AND HOT BUTTER. THESE WARMERS MAKE HEATING BUTTER EASY WHEN YOU ARE ON A PICNIC BY THE SEA. EAST TO PACK, EASY TO USE, EASY TO CLEAN.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hall

product_meta.title: Norpro Seafood Serving Set
product_meta.description: Treat your dinner guests to the full experience with this seafood serving kit full of all the essentials. Includes 2 butter warmers, 2 shellfish crackers, 6 seafood forks/scoops…even odor remover for your hands. Lobster/shellfish crackers and seafood forks/scoops are stainless steel. Butter warmers have handles and pouring spouts. Hand wash
feature_bullets: Includes 2 butter warmers, each is 1/3 cup/3oz/90ml. Includes stands and candles
Includes 2 shellfish crackers, 6 seafood forks/scoops/ features fork and scoop style ends easily retrieve delicate morsel from shell fish.
Includes odor remover. Simply rub hands under running water and odor of fish, garlic, or onion disappears!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
